languages.text: "У Джай отличная идея — пусть Леди Моллес-Секандас имеет двух мужей и продолжает радовать протекторат повышением производства".
languages.translation_comment:
Стартует этюд VC_LadyMollesWork
выдать всем колониям дов +
Никого не казним
Весы направо

languages.text: "Jae's idea is excellent. Let Lady Molles-Secundas have two husbands, and let her growing production output continue to be a blessing to the protectorate."
languages.original_text: "У Джай отличная идея — пусть Леди Моллес-Секандас имеет двух мужей и продолжает радовать протекторат повышением производства".

traits.locale_text: "Jae's idea is excellent. Let Lady Molles-Secundas have two husbands, and let her growing production output continue to be a blessing to the protectorate."
"Jae's idea is excellent. Let Lady Molles-Secundas have two husbands, and let her growing production output continue to be a blessing to the protectorate."
"Jae's idea is excellent. Let Lady Molles-Secundas have two husbands, and let her growing production output continue to be a blessing to the protectorate."
"Jae's idea is excellent. Let Lady Molles-Secundas have two husbands, and let her growing production output continue to be a blessing to the protectorate."
"Jae's idea is excellent. Let Lady Molles-Secundas have two husbands, and let her growing production output continue to be a blessing to the protectorate."
"Jae's idea is excellent. Let Lady Molles-Secundas have two husbands, and let her growing production output continue to be a blessing to the protectorate."

languages.text: "Jaes Idee ist ausgezeichnet. Gönnen wir Lady Molles-Secundas ihre zwei Männer und lassen wir sie die Produktion zum Wohl des Protektorats weiter steigern."
languages.original_text: "Jae's idea is excellent. Let Lady Molles-Secundas have two husbands, and let her growing production output continue to be a blessing to the protectorate."

traits.locale_text: "Jaes Idee ist ausgezeichnet. Gönnen wir Lady Molles-Secundas ihre zwei Männer und lassen wir sie die Produktion zum Wohl des Protektorats weiter steigern."

languages.text: « L'idée de Jae me paraît excellente. Libre à dame Molles-Secundas d'avoir deux époux tant que sa productivité croissante continue à servir les intérêts du protectorat. »
languages.original_text: "Jae's idea is excellent. Let Lady Molles-Secundas have two husbands, and let her growing production output continue to be a blessing to the protectorate."

traits.locale_text: « L'idée de Jae me paraît excellente. Libre à dame Molles-Secundas d'avoir deux époux tant que sa productivité croissante continue à servir les intérêts du protectorat. »

languages.text: “婕伊的主意很不错，就让莫莱斯-塞孔达斯夫人拥有两位丈夫吧。希望她能继续运用过人的才智，为王朝带来福祉。”
languages.original_text: "Jae's idea is excellent. Let Lady Molles-Secundas have two husbands, and let her growing production output continue to be a blessing to the protectorate."

traits.locale_text: “婕伊的主意很不错，就让莫莱斯-塞孔达斯夫人拥有两位丈夫吧。希望她能继续运用过人的才智，为王朝带来福祉。”

languages.text: «La idea de Jae es excelente. Que lady Molles-Secundas tenga dos maridos y que su elevada producción siga siendo una bendición para el protectorado».
languages.original_text: "Jae's idea is excellent. Let Lady Molles-Secundas have two husbands, and let her growing production output continue to be a blessing to the protectorate."

traits.locale_text: «La idea de Jae es excelente. Que lady Molles-Secundas tenga dos maridos y que su elevada producción siga siendo una bendición para el protectorado».

languages.text: 「ジェイの考えは素晴らしい。レディ・モレス・セクンダスには二人の夫を持たせ、その増大する生産実績が今後も保護領に恩恵をもたらすようにしよう」
languages.original_text: "Jae's idea is excellent. Let Lady Molles-Secundas have two husbands, and let her growing production output continue to be a blessing to the protectorate."

traits.locale_text: 「ジェイの考えは素晴らしい。レディ・モレス・セクンダスには二人の夫を持たせ、その増大する生産実績が今後も保護領に恩恵をもたらすようにしよう」

languages.text: "Jae'ın fikri harika. Leydi Molles-Secundas'ın iki kocası olsun. Gitgide artacak üretim de protektorayı bolluğa kavuştursun."
languages.original_text: "Jae's idea is excellent. Let Lady Molles-Secundas have two husbands, and let her growing production output continue to be a blessing to the protectorate."

traits.locale_text: "Jae'ın fikri harika. Leydi Molles-Secundas'ın iki kocası olsun. Gitgide artacak üretim de protektorayı bolluğa kavuştursun."
